mapper.sql: p_id, project_num, project_name, dept, contract_cost, out_cost, output_value, project_type, start_time, stop_time, create_time, cycle, month_cycle,is_next,is_frame,turnover
mapper.insert:
insert into project_library
p_id,
project_num,
project_name,
dept,
contract_cost,
out_cost,
output_value,
project_type,
start_time,
stop_time,
cycle,
month_cycle,
is_next,
is_frame,
turnover,
create_time
#{pId},
#{projectNum},
#{projectName},
#{dept},
#{contractCost},
#{outCost},
#{outputValue},
#{projectType},
#{startTime},
#{stopTime},
#{cycle},
#{monthCycle},
#{isNext},
#{isFrame},
#{turnover},
now()
mapper.update:
update project_library
project_name = #{projectName},
dept = #{dept},
contract_cost = #{contractCost},
out_cost = #{outCost},
output_value = #{outputValue},
project_type = #{projectType},
start_time = #{startTime},
stop_time = #{stopTime},
cycle = #{cycle},
month_cycle = #{monthCycle},
is_next = #{isNext},
is_frame = #{isFrame},
turnover = #{turnover},
create_time = now()
where project_num = #{projectNum}
mapper.select: SELECT aif.project_num AS projectNum, aif.project_name AS projectName,aif.is_dept AS dept,aif.contract_amount AS contractCost, (aif.purchasing_cost+aif.outsourcing_cost) AS outCost, (CASE WHEN is_project=0 THEN (aif.contract_amount-aif.purchasing_cost-aif.outsourcing_cost) WHEN is_project=1 THEN ((aif.contract_amount-aif.purchasing_cost-aif.outsourcing_cost)*aif.success_rate) ELSE '' END )AS outputValue, aif.project_type AS projectType, (CASE is_project WHEN 0 THEN (CASE aif.project_type WHEN '外协类' THEN (CASE cif.contract_start_time WHEN '' THEN aif.start_time ELSE cif.contract_start_time END) WHEN '系统集成类' THEN aif.start_time END ) WHEN 1 THEN aif.start_time END ) AS startTime, (CASE is_project WHEN 0 THEN (CASE aif.project_type WHEN '外协类' THEN (CASE cif.contract_end_time WHEN '' THEN aif.stop_time ELSE cif.contract_end_time END) WHEN '系统集成类' THEN aif.stop_time END ) WHEN 1 THEN (CASE aif.project_type WHEN '外协类' THEN aif.stop_time WHEN '系统集成类' THEN aif.iniTestDate END ) END )AS stopTime, ((SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,startTime,stopTime))+1) AS cycle, (SELECT outputValue/cycle) AS month_cycle FROM approval_information aif LEFT JOIN contract_information cif ON aif.project_num =cif.project_num

SELECT cif.project_num AS projectNum,cif.project_name AS projectName, cif.dept AS dept,'' AS projectType, cif.contract_amount AS contractCost,bif.other_cost AS outCost, (SELECT (contractCost-outCost)) AS outputValue, cif.contract_start_time AS startTime, (select last_day(cif.contract_start_time) ) AS stopTime, ((SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,startTime,stopTime))+1) AS cycle, (SELECT outputValue/cycle) AS month_cycle FROM contract_information cif INNER JOIN bidding_information bif ON bif.project_num=cif.project_num WHERE cif.dept='企业业务单元' AND cif.is_signing=1 AND cif.project_num !='' AND bif.budgeted_total_hours <2

SELECT cif.project_num AS projectNum,cif.project_name AS projectName, cif.dept AS dept,'' AS projectType, ( CASE cif.contract_amount WHEN 0.00 THEN bif.final_offer ELSE cif.contract_amount END ) AS contractCost, (bif.outsourcing_cost+bif.purchase_cost) AS outCost, (bif.final_offer/(1+0.16)-budgeted_cost) AS outputValue FROM bidding_information bif INNER JOIN contract_information cif ON bif.project_num=cif.project_num WHERE bif.is_bid='是' AND bif.is_outsourcing='过路单'
